name: Pics Mash
author: MYO

sections.description:
Facemash for WordPress plugin

Want even more features? Go Pro the best face mash for wordpress plugin.

  • Facemash image rating WordPress plugin “Pics Mash”
  • Find out which media image on your WordPress website is the best
  • Instantly recognisable by millions of people
  • Featured in the hit movie The Social Network
  • Engage your website visitors with your website images
  • 10x more pageviews
  • Uses the Elo rating system to rate images
  • Find out which image is best

Do you often wonder which images on your WordPress website give the biggest wow to your visitors? Through this plugin you can find out!!

What is Facemash?

Facemash.com is one of the first websites which Mark Zuckerberg (the founder of Facebook) created. This WordPress plugin reproduces a similar effect to how Mark created the facemash website.

“…the initial site generated 450 visitors and 22,000 photo-views in its first four hours online…” – Source Wikipedia

Now you can bring the same power and engagement to your own WordPress website!!! With this plugin it is really easy to add powerful image rating functionality to your site.
How does the Plugin work?

The plugin takes all the images from your WordPress media library and uses them to populate a new area of your website to store the votes and ratings of each image. You can decide which images to include or exclude by reviewing the entries in the Pics Mash area of the WordPress admin panel.

Create a Photo rating specific area of your website

The plugin uses the new features of WordPress to create a custom post type for the images involved in the Pics Mash rating tool. All the information needed (image location, ratings, votes) are saved in custom post fields that are easily extracted to be displayed on a custom page template if you so wish. With picsmash it’s easy.
Easy integration with Social Gallery plugins

The plugin works seamlessly with popular Social Gallery plugins. Why stop at just increasing user engagement through ratings and votes? With a combination of this plugin and Social Gallery plugin, you can boost user engagement 100x!!!!

Make your website even SLICKER

Epic Plugins has just released the first add on for the pics mash image rating tool. Speed up the plugin and save bandwidth by using the AJAX ADD ON

What are you waiting for?

Further Info

To find out more please visit the plugin website

http://www.picsmashplugin.com/
sections.installation: 1. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
sections.faq:
How do I display the PicsMash

The short code to display the Pics Mash is [picsmash].

How do I display top and bottom rated

The short code for top rated is [toprated] for bottom rated its [bottomrated]
sections.changelog:
v1.0 initial plugin
v1.5 update to improve admin side of the plugin

short_description: Pics Mash creates "Facemash" like hot or not image rating contests on your WordPress website.
